column4: I don't really know what Ubuntu's goals are. Frankly, I don't care that much.  Right now it works well for me.  I think you're right if the goal is to take over most of Windows' market share, but I'm not sure that's the goal (or necessarily possible).
that is not the goal of linux.  and i think ubuntu is here to make using linux as easy as it can.
Well, I think neighborlee it correct in that ubuntu is not just about being easy.  They have other priorities two, some of which conflict with ease of use.  Tradeoffs.
